data.feedback: Architecture is well-designed with clean layer separation. TypeScript types already exist and are correctly referenced. Story dependencies are logical. Minor file path inconsistencies in epic-level metadata don't affect implementability since story-level descriptions are clear.

issues.description: Epic filesToCreate includes existing files (AuthContext.tsx, useAuth.ts)
issues.recommendation: Move to filesToModify at epic level (story-auth-002 already has this correct)
Add src/pages/Login.tsx to filesToModify since description says to enhance it

issues.description: Stories reference creating pages in src/pages/auth/ but also enhancing src/pages/*.tsx
issues.recommendation: Clarify: either modify existing pages OR create new ones in auth/ subdirectory, not both

suggestions: Consider removing src/pages/auth/LoginPage.tsx and src/pages/auth/RegisterPage.tsx from filesToCreate - enhance existing pages instead
Add src/pages/Login.tsx to story-auth-003 filesToModify for consistency with description
